name: Anvi Smart Defender
body:
* Anvi Smart Defender Pro - Protect Your PC from Malware
* -------------------------------------------

* Operating Systems

* Microsoft Windows XP (32-bit and 64-bit) with SP2/SP3 or Home/Professional/Media Center
* Microsoft Windows Vista (32-bit and 64-bit) Starter/Home Basic/Home Premium/Business /Ultimate
* Microsoft Windows 7 (32-bit and 64-bit) Starter/ Home Basic/Home Premium/Professional/Ultimate 
* Microsoft Windows 8

* Hardware Requirements

* 300 MHz processor or faster processor
* 128 MB of RAM
* 50 MB of free hard disk space
*  
* Release date: Jun 08, 2013
* Version: 1.9
* File size: 24.55 MB
* Category: Anti-malware Software
* Price: 4.98

* -------------------------------------------
* Anvisoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
* Home Page: http://www.anvisoft.com
